Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Deibi
Reviews.Content: From the first day I turned it on I have not stopped to admire all the qualities you have this device. A very good screen, just my size, I'm testing it in Venezuela with Movistar, while open Digitel 4G signal in my town so I will use this operator, works great. The camera is good quality, 13 Mpx photos make itself look very very real. As for the internal memory want it to be 16Gb; really need more memory space, if you are someone who you like downloading applications, music and games plenty, 8 GB is not enough, although there is the option to insert you MicroSD up to 32 GB. The battery lasted lot at first, but after a few days or even hours begins to adapt and becomes longer charging. Overall a very good phone. Do not hesitate to buy it. 5 star to Vendors "PVCS".

Reviews.Title: battery usage poor
Reviews.Author: swayne
Reviews.Content: I received the phone on schedule, packaging was good. Its my first android phone and I'm pleasantly surprised, the OS is smooth, no lag seen so far, browses multiple pages (5) without lag, the camera is great, tones of apps. However my greatest problem is the battery usage is really poor, once the display is on whether you are on the net or not it uses up the battery quickly. When its charged in the morning (say 7 am) it barely makes it to 4 pm (when it is normally at 10%) and this is with moderate use. If you where to play a game, watch a movie, or use the camera for an hour I don't think it would last until 2 pm. The brightness of the display is as low as is practical, its set to sleep which turns of data usage, gps etc. Listening to music/radio for long isn't so bad since the display will go to sleep. The display uses between 39 - 60 % (with the OS ~ 10) of the batteries energy per charging cycle. Once the display is off it uses little energy. A better battery is needed or a more efficient display.Update 30/09/2013:the battery use is not as poor as previously stated, my initial observations were due to above normal use of the phone due to my enthusiasm with my new phone. When its charged at 7 am it will last until 6-10 pm that evening with moderate use. However playing videos,games, capturing videos or pics(for lengthy periods)and a bright a display still consumes battery quickly. Radio use does not consume that much power (i have listened to it all night without draining the battery or needing to charge it in the morning)I would recommend this phone to anyone wanting a good smartphone.

Reviews.Title: Sony Customer Service horrible
Reviews.Author: The Brickster
Reviews.Content: We bought this phone through EBay. The phone's charging receptacle went out and Sony service refused to repair it even though the phone was under warranty, it went out after a month of use. The receptacle is fused to the motherboard so it is a major repair to fix, they refused to fix it under warranty. Will never buy Sony phones again. Shameful service, stay away.
